melee_resolve_gain.title: Melee Resolve Gain
melee_resolve_gain.description: Increases Resolve gained from Melee attacks and kills.

perfect_parry_window.title: Perfect Parry Window
perfect_parry_window.description: Increases length of time that an incoming attack can be parried.

melee_stagger_dmg.title: Melee Stagger Damage
melee_stagger_dmg.description: Increases base Stagger damage against enemies.

counter_dmg.title: Counter Damage
counter_dmg.description: Increased damage on Perfect Parry and Perfect Dodge counter attacks.

ult_dmg.title: Ultimate Damage
ult_dmg.gear: katana, ranged_charm, defense_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm
ult_dmg.description: Increases base damage of the ultimate ability.

ability_cool_red.title: Ability Cooldown Reduction
ability_cool_red.gear: katana, ranged_charm, defense_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm, utility_charm
ability_cool_red.description: Reduces base cooldown of your class ability.

oni_dmg.title: Oni Damage
oni_dmg.gear: katana, ranged_charm, defense_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm, utility_charm

staggered_dmg.title: Staggered Damage
staggered_dmg.gear: katana, ranged_charm, defense_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm, utility_charm

ranged_resolve_gain.title: Ranged Resolve Gain
ranged_resolve_gain.description: Increases Resolve gained from Ranged attacks and kills.

headshot_dmg.title: Headshot Damage
headshot_dmg.description: Increases damage of headshots with the bow.

draw_spd.title: Draw Speed
draw_spd.description: Increases speed of drawing the bow.

reload_spd.title: Reload Speed
reload_spd.description: Increases speed of nocking an arrow after firing.

status_effect_dur.title: Status Effect Duration
status_effect_dur.gear: blowgun, stealth_charm, assassin_charm, kunai, dirt_throw, sticky_bomb, caltrops
status_effect_dur.description: Increases duration of all status effects and stuns from abilities.

status_effect_dmg.title: Status Effect Damage
status_effect_dmg.description: Increases damage of Fire and Poison effects.

stealth.title: Stealth
stealth.description: While in stealth enemies take longer to detect you.

blast_rad.title: Blast Radius
blast_rad.description: Increases the size of the blast radius for bombs.

resolve_gain.title: Resolve Gain
resolve_gain.gear: ranged_charm, defense_charm, utility_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm
resolve_gain.description: Increases rate of Resolve meter gained from all sources.

fire_dmg.title: Fire Damage
fire_dmg.gear: ranged_charm, defense_charm, utility_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm
fire_dmg.description: Increases damage done from all sources of fire.

dmg_red.title: Damage Reduction
dmg_red.description: Reduces damage received from all sources.

rev_health.title: Revive Health
rev_health.description: Increases starting health after being revived.

ghost_offering_health.title: Ghost Offering Health
ghost_offering_health.description: Increases health restored when interacting with a Ghost Offering.

cool_red.title: Cooldown Reduction
cool_red.gear: kunai, dirt_throw, sticky_bomb, smoke_bomb, healing_gourd, caltrops
cool_red.description: Reduces the base cooldown of this weapon.

cool_red_charm.title: Cooldown Reduction
cool_red_charm.description: Reduces the base cooldown of this weapon.

dmg_inc.title: Damage Increase
dmg_inc.description: Increases damage of all Ghost Weapons.

cool_red_kill.title: Cooldown Reduction On Kill
cool_red_kill.gear: kunai, dirt_throw, sticky_bomb, smoke_bomb, healing_gourd, caltrops
cool_red_kill.description: Any kill reduces the cooldown of this weapon.

cool_red_kill_charm.title: Cooldown Reduction On Kill (All GW)
cool_red_kill_charm.description: Any kill reduces the cooldown of all Ghost Weapons.

spirit_pull_targets.title: Spirit Pull Targe
spirit_pull_targets.description: Increases number of targets that Spirit Pull affects.

hunter_ability_radius.title: Hunter Ability Radius
hunter_ability_radius.description: Increases radius of Staggering Arrow and Explosive Arrow.

assassinate_from_above_damage.title: Assassinate from above damage
assassinate_from_above_damage.description: Increases damage when Assassinating enemies from above.

burning_blade.title: Burning Blade
burning_blade.description: Melee attacks have a chance to apply the Burning effect.

poison_blade.title: Poison Blade
poison_blade.description: Melee attacks have a chance to apply the Poison effect.

wotf.title: Way of the Flame
wotf.description: Ignite the katana to apply Burning damage to Melee attacks for a short time (R1+O).

intimidating_counter.title: Intimidating Counter
intimidating_counter.description: Perfect Parry counter attacks have a 50% chance to also deal damage to nearby foes.

stone_master.title: Stone Master
stone_master.description: Perform Stone Stance heavy attacks with ferocious speed, and the final attack does increased damage.

water_master.title: Water Master
water_master.description: Inflict increasing damage with each attack in your Surging Strikes.

wind_master.title: Wind Master
wind_master.description: Typhoon Kick deals increased Stagger damage and causes knock down.

moon_master.title: Moon Master
moon_master.description: Spinning Strike can combo 3 times. The final attack in the Heavy Strike combo deals increased damage.

poisoned_ammo.title: Poisoned Ammo
poisoned_ammo.description: Bow attacks have a chance to apply the Poison effect.

sharpened_ammo.title: Sharpened Ammo
sharpened_ammo.description: Ranged attacks have a chance to apply the Bleed effect.

headshot_refund.title: Headshot Refund
headshot_refund.description: Instantly recover non-special ammo when landing a headshot from this weapon.

helmet_piercing_ammo.title: Helmet Piercing Ammo
helmet_piercing_ammo.description: Ammo from this weapon pierces helmets.

shield_piercing_ammo.title: Shield Piercing Ammo
shield_piercing_ammo.description: Ammo from this weapon pierces shields.

throwing_shot.title: Throwing Shot
throwing_shot.description: Arrows fired with a full draw cause knock back on hit.

versatile.title: Versatile
versatile.description: Can be used by any class.

hallucination_darts.title: Hallucination Darts
hallucination_darts.description: Hallucination darts can now be equipped and cause enemies to blindly attack one another.

ronin_unlock.title: Ronin Unlock
ronin_unlock.description: Can be used by the Ronin.

flash_bomb.title: Flash Bomb
flash_bomb.description: Adds Flash Bombs to the Bomb Pack (L2+Triangle).

black_powder_bomb.title: Black Powder Bomb
black_powder_bomb.description: Add Black Powder Bombs to your bomb pack (L2+O).

assassin_unlock.title: Assassin Unlock
assassin_unlock.description: Can be used by the Assassin.

combat_regeneration.title: Combat Regeneration
combat_regeneration.description: Health regenerates up to 50 max health. Healing rate reduced by half when in combat.
combat_regeneration.gear_type: ranged_charm, defense_charm, utility_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm

leeching_parry.title: Leeching Parry
leeching_parry.description: A Perfect Parry restores a small amount of health and refills your Resolve faster.
leeching_parry.gear_type: ranged_charm, defense_charm, utility_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm

super_armor.title: Super Armor
super_armor.description: You are no longer interrupted by melee attacks and can attack through damage.
super_armor.gear_type: ranged_charm, defense_charm, utility_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm

impactful_throws.title: Impactful Throws
impactful_throws.description: Throwing an enemy through the air causes them to be knocked down for a short time and vulnerable to critical strikes.
impactful_throws.gear_type: ranged_charm, defense_charm, utility_charm, melee_charm, stealth_charm, samurai_charm, hunter_charm, ronin_charm, assassin_charm

rising_tempo.title: Rising Tempo
rising_tempo.description: Successive kills without taking damage increases damage dealt.

foul_arrows.title: Foul Arrows
foul_arrows.description: Headshots also apply Weaken to the target.

scavenger.title: Scavenger
scavenger.description: Increase ammo scavenged from pickups by 100%.

spirit_bear.title: Spirit Bear
spirit_bear.description: Ronin's Spirit Animal summons a bear instead of a dog.

healing_spirit.title: Healing Spirit
healing_spirit.description: Ronin's Spirit Animal has a healing aura.

chain_vanish.title: Chain Vanish
chain_vanish.description: Successfully assassinating an enemy whil vanished re-activates vanish and refreshes the duration (Stacks with Chain Vanish perk).

hysteria.title: Hysteria
hysteria.description: Assassinations cause nearby enemies to hallucinate.

lucky.title: Lucky
lucky.description: 15% chance to instantly reset cooldown on use.
lucky.gear_type: kunai, dirt_throw, sticky_bomb, smoke_bomb, healing_gourd, caltrops

super_massive.title: Super Massive
super_massive.description: Deals extra damage and causes lighter enemies to get thrown back when hit.

munitions.title: Munitions
munitions.description: Creates random ammo pickups on use.

sudden_resolve.title: Sudden Resolve
sudden_resolve.description: Fills the first Resolve on use.

black_powder.title: Black Powder
black_powder.description: When the Smoke Bomb detonates, nearby enemies are thrown backward.

deep_bags.title: Deep Bags
deep_bags.description: Increased radius and number of Caltrops.
